Welcome to AniSOAP’s documentation!

AniSOAP is a Python library for creating descriptors of chemical systems suitable for machine learning use. This project aims to extend SOAP descriptors by computing anisotrophy extensions.

Note

This project is under active development.

Note

AniSOAP documentation is a work in progress; please contact us with questions not yet addressed here.
